references.paper_title: Megapixel time-gated SPAD image sensor for 2D and 3D imaging applications
references.reason: This paper introduces a megapixel time-gated SPAD image sensor, which is a significant advancement in SPAD technology and is directly relevant to the work presented in the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: A 512 x 512 spad image sensor with integrated gating for widefield flim
references.reason: This paper describes a high-resolution SPAD image sensor with integrated gating, which is crucial for the high-speed imaging applications discussed in the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: The Quanta Image Sensor: Every Photon Counts
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of the quanta image sensor (QIS), which is central to the topic of the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: Image denoising and the generative accumulation of photons
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel self-supervised method for denoising shot noise corrupted photon counting images which is closely related and highly relevant to the approach in the reviewed paper.
